name: ZooScan Holo-Mero Plankton (SCHPM1)
description: Plankton lifeforms (holo- and mero-plankton) extracted from zooplankton observations by imaging (ZooScan) in the Belgian Part of the North Sea. The data was accessed via the emodnet biology parquet on EDITO.

name: ZooScan Holo-Mero Plankton (SNS)
description: Plankton lifeforms (holo- and mero-plankton) extracted from zooplankton observations by imaging (ZooScan) in the Belgian Part of the North Sea. The data was accessed via the emodnet biology parquet on EDITO.
